2020ATB_NREL_Reference_7MW_200
==============================

====================
Link to Tabular Data
====================

A .csv file is available on `GitHub <https://github.com/NREL/turbine-models/blob/master/Onshore/2020ATB_NREL_Reference_7MW_200.csv>`_.

==============
Key Parameters
==============

+------------------------+--------------------------------+----------------+
| Item                   | Value                          | Units          |
+========================+================================+================+
| Name                   | 2020 ATB NREL Reference 7 MW   | N/A            |
+------------------------+--------------------------------+----------------+
| Rated Power            | 7000                           | kW             |
+------------------------+--------------------------------+----------------+
| Rated Wind Speed       | 9.75                           | m/s            |
+------------------------+--------------------------------+----------------+
| Cut-in Wind Speed      | 3.25                           | m/s            |
+------------------------+--------------------------------+----------------+
| Cut-out Wind Speed     | 25                             | m/s            |
+------------------------+--------------------------------+----------------+
| Rotor Diameter         | 200                            | m              |
+------------------------+--------------------------------+----------------+
| Hub Height             | 175                            | m              |
+------------------------+--------------------------------+----------------+
| Drivetrain             |                                | N/A            |
+------------------------+--------------------------------+----------------+
| Control                |                                | N/A            |
+------------------------+--------------------------------+----------------+
| IEC Class              |                                | N/A            |
+------------------------+--------------------------------+----------------+

=======
Sources
=======

2020 Annual Technology Baseline (ATB):
https://atb.nrel.gov/

(Land-Based Wind): https://atb.nrel.gov/electricity/2020/index.php?t=lw
